Title: Montevideo: Taste of a Dream
Writer: Ranko Bozic, Srdjan Dragojevic, Vladimir Stankovic (novel)
Actors: Milos Bikovic, Petar Strugar, Nina Jankovic, Danina Jeftic
Plot: A story about one team that decides to follow a dream that takes them on a journey to the First World Football Championship in Montevideo, Uruguay in 1930. A dream that allows them to become true stars and living legends.
